title: Abnormal Experience: Tinkering with perverted Juices
overview: This work is a reimagining of Woody Allen's "Vicky Cristina Barcelona" (2008) in the style of a pink movie.  When the heroine (Nao Masaki), who dreams of becoming a novelist, becomes a live-in assistant, she finds herself in a crazy, different world. A perverted masterpiece that leaves you with a dizzying sense of perversion in the chaotic world of artists
